name: Revival ver.0.0.0.2forWindows
description:
What You Can Do / What's New in Version.0.0.0.2

What You Can Do–––-

A trial Walking in REVIVAL world.

What's New–––-

feeld graphics has been improved

Main characters added

Enemies added(You can kill them and you won't be die even they attack you)

Temporary UI added

Other changes and improvements.

You are a Explorer in far away world

・Recreate the world in another universe where you crash-landed In exploring the universe!

・The perpose of REVIVAL is creating own world with some resources and knowledge you luckily explored in an age of discovery universe.

For the next version

/ Showdowns with ancient civilization, puzzles

/ Adorable buddy

/ Crafting weapon, item, building

/ City Simulation (About 50 citizins)

/ Civilian Control! Legalize

/ City Defense system

Controls

How To Play

Keyboard

Move W S A D

Camera Position Mouse

Jump Space

Menu Y

Menu controls W,S, Enter

Xbox controller

Move Left Stick

Camera Position Right Stick

Jump A

Scan B

Ready RB

Fire RT

Menu Y

Menu controls Left Stick A

*It takes long time to road game in a first time to play.

Please be assured that this game will be work even a black screen appears on the screen in a long while.
